name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels and their properties.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency in rocket engines.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation strategies.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket nozzle design and operation.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance metrics and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific mission requirements.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics Principles
lessons.description: Basic principles of fluid dynamics and flow behavior.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Understanding lift, drag, and other aerodynamic forces.

lessons.name: Boundary Layer Theory
lessons.description: Study of boundary layer formation and effects on airflow.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Properties and behavior of subsonic airflow patterns.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Dynamics
lessons.description: Understanding supersonic flow and shock wave formation.

lessons.name: Transonic Flow Effects
lessons.description: Study of transonic flow and critical Mach number effects.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding convective and radiative heat transfer in flight.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Design and materials for thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Re-entry Heating Analysis
lessons.description: Analysis of heating effects during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Overview of materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding structural loads and stress analysis in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Structural Design Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing spacecraft structures for weight and performance.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws and Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Fundamental laws governing orbital motion and orbit description.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers
lessons.description: Planning and executing orbital transfer maneuvers.

lessons.name: Mission Design
lessons.description: Comprehensive mission planning and trajectory design.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Design and management of spacecraft power systems.

lessons.name: Communication Systems
lessons.description: Spacecraft communication and data transmission systems.

lessons.name: Attitude Control Systems
lessons.description: Systems for spacecraft orientation and stabilization.

name: Organic Molecular Structure
description: Study of organic compound structures and bonding patterns.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbon Structures
lessons.description: Understanding alkanes, alkenes, and aromatic compounds.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Identification and properties of organic functional groups.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Addition reactions to alkenes and alkynes.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Elimination mechanisms and product formation.

name: Organic Synthesis and Analysis
description: Techniques for organic synthesis and structure determination.

lessons.name: Spectroscopic Methods
lessons.description: NMR, IR, and mass spectrometry for structure determination.

lessons.name: Purification Techniques

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory

lessons.name: Crystal Structures
lessons.description: Understanding crystal lattices and unit cells.

lessons.name: Defects and Properties

lessons.name: Electronic Properties

description: Synthesis methods and applications of inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Catalysis

lessons.name: Materials Science Applications
